variableDataArray.meaning: Down normal vector on mesh boundaries, Y component

variableDataArray.name: semi.dngZ
variableDataArray.meaning: Down normal vector on mesh boundaries, Z component

variableDataArray.meaning: Up normal vector on mesh boundaries, X component

variableDataArray.meaning: Up normal vector on mesh boundaries, Y component

variableDataArray.name: semi.dc_down
variableDataArray.meaning: Local boundary mesh distance, downside element

variableDataArray.name: semi.dc_up
variableDataArray.meaning: Local boundary mesh distance, upside element

variableDataArray.name: semi.global_flux_tol_cd
variableDataArray.meaning: Global tolerance for finite volume fluxes (variable is replaced in subsequent semiconductor material model or charge conservation features)

variableDataArray.name: semi.dc_n
variableDataArray.meaning: Local exterior boundary distance at domain edge, (numerical)

variableDataArray.name: semi.dc_n_bnd
variableDataArray.meaning: Local exterior boundary distance at domain edge

variableDataArray.name: semi.dc_n_bnd
variableDataArray.meaning: Local exterior boundary distance at domain edge

variableDataArray.name: semi.dc_down_bnd
variableDataArray.meaning: Local boundary mesh distance, downside element (used on boundaries)

variableDataArray.name: semi.dc_up_bnd
variableDataArray.meaning: Local boundary mesh distance, upside element (used on boundaries)

variableDataArray.name: semi.dc_tot
variableDataArray.meaning: Distance between circumcenters at interior boundary, (numerical)

variableDataArray.name: semi.delta_eta_tol
variableDataArray.meaning: Tolerance for optimal average Gn Gp value

variableDataArray.name: semi.E_cd_denom_num
variableDataArray.meaning: Numerical denominator for centered difference scheme

variableDataArray.name: semi.Dcd
variableDataArray.meaning: Normal component of the electric displacement field

variableDataArray.name: semi.E_down
variableDataArray.meaning: Normal component of the electric field in the down direction

variableDataArray.name: semi.E_up
variableDataArray.meaning: Normal component of the electric field in the up direction

variableDataArray.name: semi.D_bnd_down
variableDataArray.meaning: Normal component of the electric displacement field in the down direction

variableDataArray.name: semi.D_bnd_up
variableDataArray.meaning: Normal component of the electric displacement field in the up direction

variableDataArray.name: semi.Qthn
variableDataArray.meaning: Electron non-equilibrium contribution to the thermal diffusion coefficient

variableDataArray.name: semi.Qthp
variableDataArray.meaning: Hole non-equilibrium contribution to the thermal diffusion coefficient

variableDataArray.name: semi.cp_dtd
variableDataArray.meaning: Doping and trap density continuation parameter

variableDataArray.meaning: Mesh normal vector, upside, X component

variableDataArray.meaning: Mesh normal vector, upside, Y component

variableDataArray.meaning: Mesh normal vector, upside, Z component
